message: You are traveling to Cambridge and looking forward to try local restaurants
You are looking for a restaurant. The restaurant should be in the expensive price range and should be in the centre
Make sure you get phone number
You are also looking for a place to stay. The hotel should be in the same price range as the restaurant and should be in the type of guesthouse
The hotel should be in the same area as the restaurant and should include free parking
If there is no such hotel, how about one that is in the type of hotel
Once you find the hotel you want to book it for 4 people and 3 nights starting from monday
Make sure you get the reference number
You also want to book a taxi to commute between the two places
You want to leave the hotel by 15:15
Make sure you get contact number and car type

log.text: I have a business luncheon this week and need a place to host, preferably in the centre of the city.
There are plenty of hotels and guesthouses that would do the trick in that area. Do you have a price range?
I'd like it to be expensive.
I've found 2 hotels that fit your criteria. One is called Gonville Hotel and the other is University Arms Hotel.
Excellent.  Can I get the phone number for the Gonville Hotel?
Sure thing. Their phone number is 	01223366611 . Is there anything else I can help you with?
I am looking for a restaurant that is in the centre of city and is expensive. Can you help me with that?
I sure can.  If there is a specific type of food you are interested in that would help to narrow down the possibilities.
I don't really care. It's for a business meeting so just need to make sure it's expensive so it's nice.
The Cambridge Chop House would be my recommendation, would you like me to book it for you?
Yes, I also need the reference number.
First I'll need to know how many are in your party, and what day and time you'd like?
There are 4 people. I would like it to be on Monday and arrive by 15:15.
I was able to book your table. Your reference number is FFFW4HLE.
Great, I am also looking for an expensive range guesthouse in the same area.
No, we don't have any guesthouses that are expensive.
I need a guesthouse that is in the same area as the restaurant, centre, and has free parking, too.
I am sorry we have no guesthouse hotels in the centre of town. Would you prefer another location?
I needed it to be in that side. anyway thanks for your help
Are you sure you would not prefer another side of town?
Are there any hotels like that in that area?
We have two guesthouses in centre that are on the cheap side. The alexander bed and breakfast has a 4 star rating. Would you like that one?
Yes please just book that hotel for me.
What day would you be arriving at the guesthouse?
I get into town Monday. Is the guesthouse expensive?
It is priced cheap. Would you like a different price range?
No the price range is fine. Just make sure it is in the same area as the restaurant.
Great, how many people do you want to book at Guesthouse and for how many days?
Sorry, I actually want an expensive hotel with parking in that same area
There is one option. It is the university arms hotel.
Okay, I want a reservation for 4 people starting monday, for 3 nights total
You are booked. Your reference number is PWFVG1HP
Thanks. Now I will be needing a taxi please. I want to depart from the hotel
What time do you want to leave or arrive by and what is your destination
I want to leave at 15:15 and go to the cambridge chop house
Booking completed! Booked red lexus and their contact number is 07732008521.
Thanks so much!
Is there anything else I can do for you?
No that is all I needed. Thanks!
You're welcome! Have a good day!
